channel.title: Changing both messages
channel.description:
Alright well i am using a blank 659 source and coded client, and in the client i am trying to change what is says when you first login, its the window where it says the message of the day, and if you havee messages etc, i want to change what it says at the top and at the messages and member credits, and after you click [CLICK TO BEGIN] i want to change the login message eg. WELCOME TO RUNESCAPE!
I have tried other tuts but my source and client dont have a Packet manager and i have looked in Client.java and have found no way of doing this if someone could point me in the right direction of what file to edit for the message of the day and the member and messages window, and the actual game login message [welcome to whatever] if you could help me with this i will be so greatfull, THANKS!!!!
Best regards, Justin

item.title: Changing both messages
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

use z-file searcher…

Does not come with every server source, and does not always work.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing both messages
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Okay, I read it, if you’re using windows vista or 7, use the search bar at the top of windows explorer, I’m not sure if XP has a search feature pre-installed for windows explorer.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing both messages
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Search in every source file that you have for the welcome message that gets sent.

Read full topic

Alright well i am using a blank 659 source and coded client, and in the client i am trying to change what is says when you first login, its the window where it says the message of the day, and if you havee messages etc, i want to change what it says at the top and at the messages and member credits, and after you click [CLICK TO BEGIN] i want to change the login message eg.
